source.25b64d57:
#teams who have won after batting first
batting_first=ipl[ipl["win_by_runs"]!=0]
source.ddf29cd0:
#Plotting hitogram to see the frequency of win_by_runs
plt.hist(batting_first["win_by_runs"],bins=20)
plt.show()
source.03a02270:
#Visualization of winners who have batted first 
L1=list(batting_first["winner"].value_counts()[0:5].keys())
L2=list(batting_first["winner"].value_counts()[0:5])
plt.bar(L1,L2,color=["green","red","purple"])
source.774f6048:
#Visualization of winners who have batted first usin pie chart
plt.figure(figsize=[7,7])
plt.pie(L2,labels=L1,autopct="%0.1f%%")
plt.show()

source.1caeadc5:
# Results from visualizations are giving the knowledge of the nature(batting/bowling pitch) of pitch in every city....
example:-
In 2017,

1)Hyderabad-[(batting choosed=2),(fielding choosed=5)]->Bowling pitch.

2)Pune-[(batting choosed=0),(fielding choosed=7)]->Bowling pitch.

3)Rajkot-[(batting choosed=1),(fielding choosed=4)]->Bowling pitch.

4)Indore-[(batting choosed=1),(fielding choosed=2)]->Can't say.

5)Bangalore-[(batting choosed=1),(fielding choosed=7)]->Bowling pitch.

6)Mumbai-[(batting choosed=1),(fielding choosed=7)]->Bowling pitch.

7)Kolkata-[(batting choosed=0),(fielding choosed=7)]->Bowling pitch.

8)Delhi-[(batting choosed=4),(fielding choosed=2)]->Batting pitch.

9)Chandigarh-[(batting choosed=0),(fielding choosed=4)]->Bowling pitch.
